document.full_text: the pentagon and lockheed martin corp  remain upbeat about the future of the short takeoff version of the new f-35 joint strike fighter despite defense secretary robert gates' threat to terminate the program should technical issues not be resolved in two years.
document.title: lockheed, pentagon upbeat on marine corps f-35 jet
lines_and_colors: the pentagon and lockheed martin corp  remain upbeat about the future of the short takeoff version of the new f-35 joint strike fighter despite defense secretary robert gates' threat to terminate the program should technical issues not be resolved in two years.
